name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Walter GOODROE, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
HUTCHINSON, J., dissents and would reach the merits.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Walter GOODROE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF COURT
PER CURIAM
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
HUTCHINSON, J., dissents and would reach the merits.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM

attorneys: James A. Lammendola, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Richard Goldberg, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
497 A.2d 611
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Walter GOODROE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 18, 1985.
Decided Sept. 25, 1985.
James A. Lammendola, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Richard Goldberg, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON, ZAPPALA and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
